name: Kalungi Rasuli
description: Kalungi Rasuli is a tech innovator and systems architect based in Uganda. As the CTO of Mibut, he leads the development of intelligent, decentralized platforms focused on education, collaboration, and digital transformation. Passionate about ethical AI and scalable infrastructure, Kalungi builds solutions that bridge real-world impact with cutting-edge technology.

name: Tyra Nankunda
description: Tyra Nankunda is a social media strategist passionate about shaping narratives and amplifying voices. With a focus on African political landscapes, she designs campaigns that inspire civic engagement and positive influence.

name: Michael Kato
description: Michael Kato is a software engineer specializing in cloud-native applications. He is dedicated to building scalable backend systems and mentoring young developers.

name: Sarah Lumu
description: Sarah Lumu is an EdTech entrepreneur creating digital tools for underserved communities. She believes in the power of education to transform societies.

name: David Okello
description: David Okello is a machine learning researcher focused on natural language processing and low-resource languages. He aims to bridge gaps in African linguistics using AI.

name: Grace Namara
description: Grace Namara is a UX designer passionate about creating intuitive and accessible digital experiences. She thrives at the intersection of design and human psychology.

name: Peter Mugisha
description: Peter Mugisha is a cybersecurity analyst with a focus on threat detection and prevention. He advocates for stronger cybersecurity awareness in Africa.

name: Linda Kyomuhendo
description: Linda Kyomuhendo is a digital artist and storyteller exploring African heritage through new media. She blends technology and culture to inspire creativity.

name: Samuel Bwogi
description: Samuel Bwogi is a blockchain developer working on decentralized finance applications. He is passionate about democratizing access to financial systems.

name: Anita Kabugo
description: Anita Kabugo is a healthcare innovator leveraging digital health platforms to improve patient outcomes and data-driven medical research.

name: James Tumwine
description: James Tumwine is an economist researching digital economies and how technology reshapes trade in Africa.

name: Ruth Aine
description: Ruth Aine is a journalist and media trainer focusing on digital rights, freedom of expression, and storytelling for change.

name: Brian Musoke
description: Brian Musoke is a data scientist specializing in predictive analytics for agriculture and food security.

name: Esther Nakato
description: Esther Nakato is a digital marketer focused on brand growth and online engagement strategies for startups.

name: Allan Byaruhanga
description: Allan Byaruhanga is a robotics engineer passionate about designing autonomous systems for industrial and agricultural use.

name: Catherine Nabirye
description: Catherine Nabirye is a humanitarian project manager working with NGOs to coordinate disaster relief and capacity building.

name: Isaac Mulindwa
description: Isaac Mulindwa is a fintech innovator working on mobile money integrations for unbanked populations in Africa.

name: Patricia Adoch
description: Patricia Adoch is a climate activist advocating for renewable energy adoption and sustainable policy frameworks.

name: Ronald Ssemanda
description: Ronald Ssemanda is a game developer creating immersive African-inspired gaming experiences.

name: Florence Atwine
description: Florence Atwine is a public health expert leveraging data analytics for epidemic tracking and prevention.
